headline: Here's why Stacey Abrams could lose to Kemp by MORE this year
author: WND News Services
sentences: If you're Stacey Abrams and you see that Kemp, number one, does fine with the  rural white base vote, and number two, that he's pulling pretty good margins in the Atlanta suburbs, you start to worry because your path to victory is closed off.
